### Tender Announcement: Pharmacovigilance and Materiovigilance IT Plan Initiatives

#### Background
The Health Products and Food Branch (HPFB) of Health Canada reviews, regulates, and approves thousands of health products and foods essential to the well-being of Canadians. To modernize business efficiency and coordinate information technology (IT) systems with departmental strategies, HPFB aims to inform Canadians about healthy choices.

#### Tender Details
- **Tender Number:** CB-7762-20852244
- **Amendment Number:** 1
- **Solicitation Number:** 1000251532
- **Publication Date:** July 31, 2023
- **Tender Closing Date:** August 16, 2023, at 14:00:00

#### Description
The Health Products and Food Branch (HPFB) requests proposals from qualified Supply Arrangement (SA) holders to provide IT consultation services for pharmacovigilance and materiovigilance IT projects. The services will include gathering requirements, planning and coordinating interoperability, and building frameworks based on standards such as HL7.

*   ** Required Resources:**
    *   System Analysts
    *   Testers
    *   Technology Architects
*   **Location:** Canada, with a focus on the National Capital Region (NCR)

#### Submittal Information
Inquiries regarding this RFP requirement must be submitted to Beverly Shawana, Contracting Authority. RFP documents will be e-mailed directly from the Contracting Authority to the Qualified SA Holders. The Crown retains the right to negotiate with any supplier on any procurement.

**NOTICE:** Task-Based Informatics Professional Services (TBIPS) Method of Supply is refreshed three (3) times per year. Qualified SA holders may be eligible to participate. Please contact RCNMDAI-NCRIMOS@pwgsc.gc.ca for more information.



### End of Tender Announcement
